General.Name: Shunfa Hengye Corp
General.Description: Shunfa Hengye Corporation engages in real estate development and operation business. The company primarily develops residential real estate projects. It is also involved in wind power electricity generation and property management business. Shunfa Hengye Corporation is based in Xiaoshan, China.
General.Address: Nanhu New Village Office, Changchun, China, 130012
